context: Analyze this standing forward fold pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Pyramid Pose (Parsvottanasana) Deep forward fold over straight front leg. Consider the Hamstring flexibility, hip mobility, spinal articulation. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Deep forward fold over straight front leg
practitioner.primaryFocus: Hamstring flexibility, hip mobility, spinal articulation

specificNeeds: Hamstring flexibility, hip mobility, spinal articulation
